item.description:
I just baked the first pumpkin pie of the year and the baby bear pumpkins from hutchins are delicious!!! It got me thinking about Thanksgiving so I thought I would extend an invitation to members of this meetup to join us on Thanksgiving day for an Organic Vegan Thanksgiving Family meal.

10:30am-2:30pm cooking and setting up; 2:30pm-3:30pm feasting; 3:30pm-6:30pm games and clean up; 7pm Dessert!

Proposed Menu Includes: Kamut Bread Sculputure*; Barleybread Sage Leek Stuffing*; Mashed Potatoes;* Yams;* Cranberry Sauce*; Calabacitas*; Green Beans; Roasted Brussell Sprouts;* Collard Greens*; Arroz con Bainica;* Salad;* Vegan Eggnog*; Pumpkin Pie*; Banana Coconut Cream Pie;* Pecan Pie;* Coconut Bliss Vanilla Island Ice Cream*; Rice Dream;* Martinelli's Organic Sparkling Cider*; Knudsens Sparkling Cherry Juice*; Knudsens Sparkling Pear Juice*;

 

* indicate that someone is bringing the dish. Please coordinate with Dushenka by phone at 978-369-1459. I have 25 seats at my table. I have spoken to 21 people. If you would like to come, please call me before 8:30pm tonight or between 8:30am and noon tomorrow. If you can't give me a call in that window, send me an email (dmyrsta@yahoo.com) - please use my email address rather than sending a message through this site - and let me know when we can speak by phone.
item.name: Vegan Family Thanksgiving Feast
